metadata.title: CVE-2020-24750 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.10.6 mishandles the interactionbetween serialization gadgets and typing, related tocom.pastdev.httpcomponents.configuration.JndiConfiguration.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
